thread.title: Shaq turns into a football player and tackles Charles Barkley and Kenny Smith
thread.title_full: Shaq turns into a football player and tackles Charles Barkley and Kenny Smith - SBNation.com

author: Mark Sandritter
title: Shaq turns into a football player and tackles Charles Barkley and Kenny Smith
text:
If you’ve ever wondered what a 7’1 football player would look like, you now know thanks to Shaquille O’Neal.
Night, night Chuck pic.twitter.com/56dSB4Ozyz
— NBA on TNT (@NBAonTNT) January 20, 2017 The Inside the NBA crew had special guest Randy Moss on the show on Thursday. So, naturally they played a little football. It turns out Shaq is a pretty decent strong safety. If NFL players thought Kam Chancellor was an intimidating presence over the middle, imagine Shaq in pads barreling down on a receiver.
We also got to see what a 7’1 break dancer would look like.
. @RandyMoss & @KGArea21 stop by Studio J for a little competition with the #InsidetheNBA crew! pic.twitter.com/VmOYfSSzMr
— NBA on TNT (@NBAonTNT) January 20, 2017
